title: Shriram City Union Finance says business picked pace as MSME segment did well - CNBCTV18
content: Shriram City Union Finance says business picked pace as MSME segment did well  CNBCTV18
description: "Within the MSME space, we largely cater to the trading community and they have rebounded with the pick-up in activity, thus spurring demand for MSME credit," Shriram City Union Finance Managing Director and CEO YS Chakravarti said.
